price: N’ukwezi nyene, Twebwe Allah, Twakugeneye ibituro vyakwo buri joro, aho mu mboneko zakwo kuba ari guto, kukagenda kurakura gushika n’aho kwiburungushura mu mfato, hanyuma kugatangura kugabanuka bukebuke mu mpito, gushika n’aho kungana n’agati k’itende kumye, kagahishira kakigonda.
arabic: وَٱلۡقَمَرَ قَدَّرۡنَٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلۡعُرۡجُونِ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

meta.transliteration: wal-qamara qaddarnāhu manāzila ḥattā ʿāda kal-ʿur'jūni al-qadīmi
